      • insertSorted

        public void insertSorted(java.lang.Comparable _value,
                boolean _ascending)
                  throws ValueException
        Description copied from interface: Sortable
        insert one element into the Sortable and do so either in ascending //or descending fashion
        Specified by:
        insertSorted in interface Sortable
        Parameters:
        _value - the value you want to insert
        _ascending - if _ascending is true the value is inserted ascending. If _ascending is false the value is decending inserted.
        Throws:
        ValueException - if the value is not comparable to the head value
